content.text:
# List of Uruguayan historians

A list of notable historians from Uruguay:
A
*Carlos Anaya
*Mariano Arana
*Orestes Araújo
*Arturo Ardao
*Leopoldo Artucio
*Fernando O. Assunção
B
*Francisco Bauzá
C
*Marta Canessa
G
*Juan Giuria
F
*Hugo Fernández Artucio
L
*Rolando Laguarda Trías
*César J. Loustau
*Aurelio Lucchini
M
*Carlos Maggi
*Isidoro de María
*Alberto Methol Ferré
N
*Benjamín Nahum
R
*Carlos Real de Azúa
*Silvia Rodríguez Villamil (1939-2003), historian, feminist, writer, activist
*Graciela Sapriza (born 1945), Uruguayan historian, educator
S
*Oscar Secco Ellauri
Z
*Alberto Zum Felde
See also
*History of Uruguay
